testcase.name: Successful login with valid credentials - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on the login page.........................................passed When the user enters username "tomsmith" and password "SuperSecretPassword!".passed And the user clicks the login button........................................passed Then the user should be redirected to the secure area.......................passed And a success "You logged into a secure area!" should be displayed..........passed

testcase.name: Verify checkboxes can be selected and deselected
testcase.system-out: Given I open the checkboxes page............................................passed When I check the first checkbox.............................................passed Then The first checkbox should be checked...................................passed When I uncheck the second checkbox..........................................passed Then The second checkbox should be unchecked................................passed

testcase.name: Search for a term
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the Google search page........................................passed When I search for "GitHub"..................................................passed Then I should see "GitHub" in the results...................................passed
